response.original_title: The Life of Adolf Hitler: The Path to Dictatorship
response.overview: How did Adolf Hitler come to create a regime, to hold the World in a grip of terror the likes of which had never been seen before?Hitler's rise from a rabble rouser on the streets of Bavaria to the pinnacle of power in Berlin and conquest of most of Western Europe, is one of the most extraordinary and savage stories of our time. Millions of Germans saw in him the Messiah he felt himself to be.
response.title: The Life of Adolf Hitler: The Path to Dictatorship
